# Intake Checklist

- Opportunity name:
- Customer/Agency:
- Due date / portal:
- Contact + communication rules:
- Submission format (PDF/DOCX/Portal specifics):
- Page limits / fonts / margins:
- Mandatory requirements present (Yes/No):
- Key dates (Q&A, draft, reviews):
- Win themes agreed (bullets):
- Go/No-go approved by:
- Sources to include (links/paths):
- Restricted content constraints:
- Budget cap (LLM spend, total):
- Assigned roles (Lead, SMEs, QA, Legal, Pricing):

---

Sample (Sydney Metro CMS Modernization)
- Opportunity name: Sydney Metro CMS Modernization 2025
- Customer/Agency: Sydney Metro (NSW Government)
- Due date / portal: 2025-10-15 / Buy.NSW portal
- Contact + communication rules: All comms via portal; no off-portal Q&A
- Submission format (PDF/DOCX/Portal specifics): 2 PDFs (Tech, Mgmt), 12pt font
- Page limits / fonts / margins: 60 pages tech; 30 pages mgmt; 12pt; 2cm margins
- Mandatory requirements present (Yes/No): Yes (records, WCAG 2.1 AA, DR)
- Key dates (Q&A, draft, reviews): Q&A 2025-09-15; Draft 2025-09-25; Red team 2025-10-02
- Win themes agreed (bullets): Risk-reduced migration; NSW policy-by-design; measurable service KPIs
- Go/No-go approved by: Proposal Lead, Practice Head
- Sources to include (links/paths): docs/knowledge/sydney_metro_cms_modernization/
- Restricted content constraints: No PII in drafts; AU-only data flows
- Budget cap (LLM spend, total): $1,200 LLM; $10,000 fixed; success fee applies
- Assigned roles (Lead, SMEs, QA, Legal, Pricing): Lead: A. Lee; SMEs: M. Chen, R. Singh; QA: J. Patel; Legal: L. Oâ€™Connor; Pricing: D. Webb
